text: Francisco Javier Perez Canduelas (born March 17, 1969 in Valencia) is a track and field athlete from Spain. He has a disability: He is blind and a T12/B2 type athlete. He raced at the 1996 Summer Paralympics in the T12 marathon and he finished third. == References == Category:Spanish long-distance runners Category:Living people Category:1969 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T12 Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2 Category:People from Valencia
title: Francisco Javier Perez Canduelas
